Package net.jsocket

Members of this package are used by both the client and the server part of this library
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientConnectionHandle
    Handles new client connections
    ClientDisconnectedHandle
    Handles disconnected clients
    Constants
    Often used constants
    Message
    General interface used by all messages sent via a DataCarrier
    MessageHandle
    Functional interface used for handling incoming messages
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataCarrier
    Encapsulates the data, that is being sent between the server and its clients
    DisconnectMessage
    A message sent when a client disconnects.
    Can be sent by a client as a request to disconnect or by the server to announce that the client was disconnected on the server side and the socket was closed
    EncryptedCarrier
    Contains encrypted DataCarrier and encryption IV when it is transported
    KeyExchangeMessage
    Used during the handshake by the client to send the RSA encrypted AES key
    PublicKeyMessage
    Used to transport the server's public key and the client's new clientID from the server.
    SocketPeerID
    Uniquely identifies a member of the socket communication
    TextMessage
    Used as generic Text message with a timestamp of its creation
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConversationOrigin
    Indicates the direction of a message
    ConversationReason
    Indicates the usage of a message
    Direction
    Used for message direction indication.
    DisconnectReason
    The reason of this disconnect
